results.description: Reading continue their resurgence under new manager Mark Bowen as they easily beat Luton Town.
results.title: Reading 3-0 Luton Town: Mark Bowen continues Royals' resurgence with third win in four

thumbnail.altText: Ovie Ejaria celebrates a goal for Reading

results.description: Goals from Jordan Obita and Sam Baldock give Reading victory over Millwall at the Madejski Stadium.
results.title: Reading 2-1 Milwall: Jordan Obita & Sam Baldock give Royals victory

results.description: Nottingham Forest's home Championship game against Reading is one of six EFL games postponed because of rain.
results.title: Nottingham Forest P-P Reading: Game called off after City Ground rain

results.description: Sam Baldock's equaliser helps Mark Bowen to remain unbeaten in two games as Reading manager.
results.title: Queens Park Rangers 2-2 Reading: Sam Baldock equaliser secures point for Reading

results.description: Matthew Miazga scores in the eighth minute of stoppage time against Preston to give Mark Bowen a winning start as Reading boss.
results.shortTitle: Reading beat Preston in stoppage time
results.title: Reading 1-0 Preston North End: Miazga late goal secures win for Royals

results.description: New Reading boss Mark Bowen says he had originally been recruiting candidates for the role before being offered it himself.
results.title: Mark Bowen: New Reading boss had started a shortlist of candidates

results.description: Mark Bowen takes charge as manager of Championship club Reading having been appointed sporting director in August.
results.shortTitle: Bowen takes charge as Reading manager
results.title: Reading: Mark Bowen takes charge as manager following Jose Gomes sacking

results.description: Reading sack manager Jose Gomes after just 10 months in charge following a poor run of form in the Championship.
results.shortTitle: Reading sack boss Gomes after poor run
results.title: Jose Gomes: Reading sack manager after poor run of form

results.description: Bristol City extend their unbeaten run in the Championship to 10 matches with victory over Reading at Ashton Gate.
results.shortTitle: Bristol City battle to win over Reading
results.title: Bristol City 1-0 Reading: Famara Diedhiou winner keeps pressure on Jose Gomes

results.description: Aleksandar Mitrovic and Tom Cairney both score twice as Fulham earn a comprehensive away victory over Reading.
results.shortTitle: Fulham cruise to win at 10-man Reading
results.title: Reading 1-4 Fulham: Aleksandar Mitrovic & Tom Cairney star against 10-man Royals
